item.title: Mentioned by The Chronicle Journal
item.description:
'1-man show' irks Rickford
Kenora MP Greg Rickford is not happy about the provincial government's “one-man show” where funding was announced to keep the Experimental Lakes Area research facility open. “I considered it a priority to keep the ELA running,” Rickford said Tuesday, ...
